short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SwiftSlots by IEEE-VIT helps VIT students create the best FFCS timetable based on course and slot preferences.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SwiftSlots is a tool designed by IEEE-VIT to simplify the course selection process for VIT students. This extension helps students navigate VIT's Fully Flexible Credit System (FFCS) by enabling them to create an optimized timetable based on their chosen courses and slot preferences. SwiftSlots allows users to extract course details directly from VTOP, select their preferred courses, and filter by morning or afternoon sessions. With just a few clicks, SwiftSlots generates a personalized PDF with all possible slot combinations, ensuring students get the best schedule that meets their needs.
